# Scramble Portal (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Chaotic Spells|chaotic]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a cracked mirror)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One interplanar *[[Gate (Spell)|gate]]* or portal

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None (for portal)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 181

*You raise your hand and send a roiling ball of crackling, multicolored energy at the portal, knowing its chaotic power will give portal users a surprise.*

You randomize the destination of one interplanar *gate* or portal for the duration of the spell. Anyone who passes through the portal from either side is sent to a random plane instead of the portalâ€™s normal destination. All those who fail the save on the same round go to the same location on the same plane.
